about.title: About Us
about.content: We founded Orange Door Investment Group to open the door for everyday investors to participate in high quality real estate projects with real impact.

team.name: Lara Chapman
team.bio:
With a foundation in corporate credit and operations, Lara Chapman brings structure and accountability to every stage of the investment process. After several years in corporate credit and operations, she transitioned to entrepreneurship, building businesses in wellness, real estate, and home staging. Through these ventures, she gained firsthand experience in acquisitions, renovations, and portfolio growth across multiple markets.

At Orange Door Investment Group, Lara oversees asset management and investor communications, ensuring each project performs as planned and that investors stay informed every step of the way. Her focus on financial precision, transparent communication, and long-term relationships reflects ODIG‚Äôs investor-first values.

team.name: Ryan Chapman
team.bio:
Ryan Chapman brings a sharp eye for opportunity and a talent for connecting people with the right investments. His background in sales, business development, and strategic partnerships shaped his ability to analyze deals from both an investor and operator perspective.

At Orange Door Investment Group, Ryan leads investor relations and acquisition strategy, sourcing projects, negotiating with operators, and aligning each partnership with ODIG's commitment to performance and integrity. He is known for his straightforward communication style, diligence in underwriting, and drive to make solid, profitable projects accessible to everyday investors.

cta.title: Let's Build Something Lasting
cta.paragraph1: We believe real estate investing should be transparent, collaborative, and rewarding for everyone involved. Whether you are new to passive investing or already expanding your portfolio, we invite you to learn more about our projects and how we work with investors.
cta.paragraph2: Join our investor list or schedule a call to start the conversation about upcoming opportunities.

items.title: Multifamily Investments
items.description: We target properties with below market rents, deferred maintenance, or inefficient management. We create value through renovations, operational efficiency, and resident experience improvements that drive long term growth.

items.title: Senior Living Communities
items.description: We focus on Independent Living, Assisted Living, and Memory Care in high demand markets. We partner with proven operators who deliver quality care while maintaining strong financial performance.

items.title: Other Commercial Investments
items.description:
While our core focus remains multifamily and senior living, ODIG also evaluates select opportunities across other commercial asset classes. Our team can underwrite and manage a variety of projects when the numbers and strategy make sense.

Examples include:

  • Mobile Home Parks: Affordable housing with consistent demand.
  • Self Storage Facilities: Recession resilient assets with predictable cash flow.
  • Flex Industrial Spaces: Adaptive small bay properties serving modern businesses.
  • Hospitality Conversions: Repurposing underperforming hotels into long term housing or senior care.

steps.title: Acquire at a Discount
steps.description: Target off market or underperforming assets where value can be created through strategic improvements and better management.

steps.title: Create Value
steps.description: Renovate units, improve operations, and elevate resident experience to increase NOI and property value.

steps.title: Partner with Experts
steps.description: Work with experienced operators and property managers who have a proven record of performance and excellence.

steps.title: Stabilize Quickly
steps.description: Lease to target occupancy and lock in efficient processes and expense management.

steps.title: Refinance Early
steps.description: Return capital when the property supports new financing at favorable terms.

steps.title: Disciplined Exit
steps.description: Sell based on data, market conditions, and the business plan to maximize returns.

items.title: Preferred Returns
items.description: Investors are paid first, ensuring your capital receives priority.

items.title: Strong IRR Targets
items.description: Double digit internal rate of return targets and high equity multiples.

items.title: Passive Income
items.description: Quarterly distributions once a property is stabilized.

items.title: Real Impact
items.description: Better housing for families and dignified communities for seniors.

items.title: What Is a Real Estate Syndication?
items.description: A real estate syndication allows multiple investors to pool resources and invest in large properties together.

items.title: How Preferred Returns Work
items.description: Preferred returns give investors priority on returns up to a stated annual rate before profits are shared.

items.title: Understanding GP and LP Roles
items.description: General Partners handle operations; Limited Partners contribute capital and earn passive income.
